name: Intro to Economics
description: Introduction to the principles of economics with an emphasis on microeconomics.

name: Intermediate Microeconomics
description: Study of economic models of consumer and firm behavior, market structure, and resource allocation.

name: Intermediate Macroeconomics
description: Study of economic models of national income, inflation, unemployment, and economic growth.

name: Econometrics
description: Study of the application of statistical methods to economic analysis.

name: Urban Economics
description: Study of the economic forces that shape the structure and growth of cities.
